Articles.Content: I was playing around with the debug window and added Worlds First contracts in the window. For some reason I cannot turn them off anymore. The contract automatically show up after starting a new career and I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling a couple of times now. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Only other thing I can think of at this point is wiping my computer and starting over.

Hi bpotter599, those contracts are automatically complete when you pass milestones, and you don't need to accept them in the Mission Control building anymore, this is a deliberate design choice.

If your issue is not that the contracts are already "accepted" please see the support stickies and provide more information on your issue.

May be a bug, and, however, I did not do extensive research to see if anyone else has posted (I know, shame on me and beat me with a wet noodle!).

First contract when starting a new campaign is "Launch your first vessel." I cannot complete that mission and when I use the debug menu to complete it, it comes right back in the contract list.

This is happening in both modded and unmodded games.

Thank you.
